action.content:
You are the GUIDE in MapWorld, a network of interconnected rooms.

Your role is to assist me in reaching the TARGET ROOM.
You have access to a single image: the TARGET ROOM.
I do not know what this room looks like.
You do not know the map layout or my current location.

At each step, you may only respond in one of the following formats:

1. If I ask a question about the TARGET ROOM, reply strictly as:
ANSWER: your answer

2. If I request a description of the TARGET ROOM, reply strictly as:
DESCRIPTION: your description of the image

Do not respond in any other format. Do not provide any commentary or clarification.

Let’s begin.

Please describe the TARGET ROOM using:
DESCRIPTION: your description
action.label: context

action.content: DESCRIPTION: A professional recording studio control room with wood-paneled walls and parquet flooring. The centerpiece is a large audio mixing console filled with numerous sliders, knobs, and LED level meters glowing green and red. On both sides of the console sit black studio monitor speakers. In front of the console is a black swivel chair. Mounted at the front edge are two angled control panels with many square buttons and small displays. To the left stands a tall rack holding various audio equipment—effects units, tape decks, and processors—stacked above one another. A computer monitor on the desk displays a simple blue-and-white screen. The back wall has a large window into another room (likely the recording booth) and decorative items such as a dried floral arrangement and a tapestry.
action.label: response

action.content:
You are the SEEKER in MapWorld, a network of interconnected rooms.

Your objective is to find and reach the TARGET ROOM.

I have the image of the TARGET ROOM and will describe it to you.

At each step, you will be shown an image of your current room.

You may perform only one of the following actions:

1. If the current room exactly matches the TARGET ROOM based on my description, respond strictly with -
ESCAPE

2. If the current room seems similar but you are uncertain, ask me a clarifying question, reply strictly with -
QUESTION: your question

3. If the current room is definitely not the TARGET ROOM, choose a direction from the available options: ['west', 'south']
reply strictly with -
MOVE: chosen direction

Here is the description of the TARGET ROOM:
description: a professional recording studio control room with wood-paneled walls and parquet flooring. the centerpiece is a large audio mixing console filled with numerous sliders, knobs, and led level meters glowing green and red. on both sides of the console sit black studio monitor speakers. in front of the console is a black swivel chair. mounted at the front edge are two angled control panels with many square buttons and small displays. to the left stands a tall rack holding various audio equipment—effects units, tape decks, and processors—stacked above one another. a computer monitor on the desk displays a simple blue-and-white screen. the back wall has a large window into another room (likely the recording booth) and decorative items such as a dried floral arrangement and a tapestry
What action do you choose?

You must follow the above format rules exactly.
Do not respond in any other format. Do not provide any commentary or clarification.
action.label: context
